basicInfo.name: ラーズグリーズ
basicInfo.flavor: 天上に脅威となり得る破壊の力に関する情報を集めていた中、フレイが貴族たちの悪行により命を落とす。悲しみに暮れた彼女は、フレイとは異なる方法で天上を守り抜くと誓う。

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 60% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 70% of Defense 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 60% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 70% of Magic Attack.

Skill 1.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 35% of Physical Attack 4 time(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 37% of Defense 4 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 35% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 37% of Magic Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
4 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 35% of Physical Attack 4 time(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 37% of Defense 4 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 35% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 37% of Magic Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Defense Reduction to 39%.

Passive (Trans).desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 25% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
 - Deals damage equal to 30% of Defense 3 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 25% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 30% of Magic Attack.

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Books, chess, the color pink, Freyr, grilled meat, sausages, confidence, strength, rationality, clear hierarchy
profile.dislikes: Judging by appearances, the color blue, Skuld, spicy food, illogical thinking, thick-wittedness, obstinance, dumb people
profile.story: 天上に脅威となり得る破壊の力に関する情報を集めていた中、フレイが貴族たちの悪行により命を落とす。悲しみに暮れた彼女は、フレイとは異なる方法で天上を守り抜くと誓う。

basicInfo.name: ラーズグリーズ
basicInfo.flavor: 隠遁生活中に出会ったレギンレイフは、彼女の素早い先読みと緻密な戦術に驚き、天上の守護者候補として推薦する。その後、候補者の能力を証明するため、フレイの参謀となり共に天上を守る方法を模索する。

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 220% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 220% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 95% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 95% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Weakness Hit Chance Boost
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 13%.

profile.story: 隠遁生活中に出会ったレギンレイフは、彼女の素早い先読みと緻密な戦術に驚き、天上の守護者候補として推薦する。その後、候補者の能力を証明するため、フレイの参謀となり共に天上を守る方法を模索する。

basicInfo.name: ラーズグリーズ
basicInfo.flavor: 生まれつき身体が弱かったが、武芸家の後継者として過酷な訓練を耐えなければならなかった。結局、訓練中に脚を重傷し、腹違いの姉に後継の座を譲り、隠遁生活を送る。

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 80% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 80% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 200% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 200% of Physical Attack.

Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 85% of Physical Attack 3 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 85% of Physical Attack.

Passive.desc:
Self
 - Weakness Hit Chance Boost
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Effect: Weakness Hit Chance Boost to 13%.
